mapper.select: select distinct p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_standard, p.product_unit, c.category_name, p.product_spec, s.stock_quantity from product p join item i on p.product_id = i.product_id join stock s on s.item_id = i.item_id join category c on c.category_id = p.category_id where s.branch_id = #{branch_id} order by p.product_name ;
